choices: Forget work, I'm going back to bed.
I'll go now and stay late after work to make up for lost time.
You reluctantly go, but don't hurry.
1.content:
You yawn as you get out of your bed. The sun was coming through your blinds, and you had to avoid all the stuff on the floor of your room to get to the door. You thought it was the weekend, and thank the lord for that you needed a break. Your job was getting exhausting.

"Jacob!" You call into the small apartment you shared with your roommate.

They call you name back, "What are you doing here?! Don't you have work today?"

You find them in their room, standing up from their desk, which was cluttered with papers, notebooks, and other writing and school-related supplies.

"Uh no?" You say, "It's Saturday, why would I work today?"

Jacob smacks his forehead, "It's Friday! You are so going to get fired."

Your eyes widen.

What do you do?
1.title: Weekend?

info.brief_description: You are in the modern world. The only twist is that magic is there too.
info.description:
In this story you are in the modern world with magic. Magic was revealed to the public centuries ago, and the modern world had adapted with it. With coffee shops selling shots of "moral boosts" and "temper control", and faster communication and transportation. Your world couldn't be better, and you would probably never change it. Well, except your job maybe.

That all changes, however, when you spot something that should not exist anymore.

A dragon.

What do you do?
